ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] all i can say is hmmmm
ygData.msgSnippet: actually most people i know that have 2+ pc s have their own (on multiple accounts allready): -tank -healer -teleporter -chanter ... From: John Grady
ygData.messageBody:
actually most people i know that have 2+ pc's have their own (on multiple
accounts allready):
-tank
-healer
-teleporter
-chanter


-----Original Message-----
From: John Grady [mailto:john_grady@...]
Sent: July 6, 2001 12:54 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] all i can say is hmmmm


Operationally its a great move on Verant's part. Solves a couple problems
and brings in new revenue too. Obviously they've hired some more business
minded people over the last couple of years.

Now everyone that has 2 PCs should have their own personal TPer, PLer,
etc.

Tzeetch
The Commune, Xegony

--- Christopher Sanders <christopher.sanders@...> wrote:

I think the $50 for 1 character will deter most rational EQ players.

Of the remaining determined to do it, I'll bet over 50% get ripped off in
equipment trades, and the subsequent uproar should be entertaining.

Atonal
